text:
[Verse]
Walking by the river
Skipping stones alone
Sunset in the distance
Heart feels like home

[Verse 2]
Footprints in the sand
Waves crashing near
Dreams in my hand
No more fear

[Chorus]
Skipping stones in the light
Feelings rise
Reaching heights
Skipping stones in the night
Making wishes
Stars so bright

[Verse 3]
Laughing through the breeze
Mind at ease
Oh yes
Underneath the willow trees
Find some rest

[Verse 4]
Counting all the skies
Blue to pink they change
Endless like the ties
We rearrange

[Chorus]
Skipping stones in the light
Feelings rise
Reaching heights
Skipping stones in the night
Making wishes
Stars so bright
title: Skipping Stones
